Requirements¶

This section outlines the requirements for using this library.

System Requirements¶

  • Python version: Python 3.8 or higher

  • Operating system: Works on Linux, macOS, and Windows

  • Libraries: See below for required Python packages.

Installation¶

To install the required libraries, run:

pip install -r requirements.txt

Dependencies¶

The following libraries are necessary to run this project:

  • requests - For making HTTP requests.

  • PyYAML - For handling YAML files.

  • pytest - For running tests.

Additional Notes¶

If you encounter any issues with dependencies, please consult the documentation for each library.
